info.label: Full stack developer
info.brief: Software Developer with 6+ years history of diverse industry expirience. Startup founder with expirience of bootstraping and scaling SaaS product without external investments to profitable company. Highly organized and independent; able to effectively coordinate tasks to accomplish projects with timeliness and creativity. Innovative, enthusiastic, and uncompromising work ethic. Functional programming - Rank 1 @ HackerRank
